publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3934 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Budget (Scotland) (No.3) Billâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Budget (Scotland) (No.3) Bill, debate on amendments shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion no later than 15 minutes after the Stage begins (excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when the meeting of the Parliament is suspended, other than a suspension following the first division in the Stage being called, or otherwise not in progress). Supported by: George Lyon*
